questions.question: How many guns were fired in the ceremonial salute during China's military parade in Beijing on Sept. 3, 2025?
questions.explanation: Multiple reports covering the Sept. 3, 2025 Beijing ceremony state it began with an 80-gun artillery salute to mark the 80th anniversary of Japan's WWII defeat.

questions.question: According to the ABS release on Sept. 3, 2025, what was Australia's GDP growth over the year to June 2025 (year‑on‑year)?
questions.explanation: The Australian Bureau of Statistics reported annual (year‑on‑year) GDP growth of 1.8% for the year to June 2025. The previously listed 0.6% figure referred to the quarter‑on‑quarter (June quarter) change and was removed to avoid confusion; the other options are not the reported year‑on‑year figure.

questions.question: On what date were two Victoria Police officers shot dead while executing a search warrant at a Porepunkah property?
questions.explanation: The shooting occurred on 26 August 2025 when officers were executing a search warrant at a rural property in Porepunkah; some follow-up reporting and victim identification were published on 27 August, which may cause confusion, but the incident date is 26 August 2025.

questions.question: On what date (UK local time / BST) is the Wallaroos' Pool A match against hosts England scheduled to be played at Brighton Community Stadium in the 2025 Women's Rugby World Cup?
questions.explanation: The official match fixture lists England v Australia (Pool A) at Brighton Community Stadium on Saturday, 6 September 2025 — UK local date (kick‑off 17:00 BST). Note that this kick‑off converts to early Sunday 7 September in Australian timezones, which is why the question now specifies UK local time.

questions.question: After a late-night traffic stop in Moultonborough, New Hampshire, on what date is Succession actor Nicholas Braun scheduled to be arraigned?
questions.explanation: Multiple reputable news outlets and court-record reporting state Nicholas Braun is scheduled to be arraigned on September 16, 2025.
